title: VR-Based English Listening Proficiency Development Course: Practical Applications for Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English communication skills and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: VR technology-based English listening training for corporate managers in the mathematics field, focusing on practical conversation scenarios required in the workplace.

learning_goals: Learners perform work-related English listening tasks with over 80% accuracy in a VR environment.
Learners improve actual test scores by 15% by applying TOEIC Listening part-specific strategies.
Learners develop the ability to identify key information in diverse VR scenarios (meetings, negotiations, presentations).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
